Text: But won't text and stuff in the game still be in german?

Just go to ge.ini file and chance subtitles to english then go to your data folder and take out german speach pak and put in english speach pak, then rename speach_english.pak to speach_german.pak.
You will trick the game and will have fully english version.

If you need english subtitle download this http://www.gamershell.com/download_15929.shtml and change in ini like that 
VoiceLanguage=German
SubtitleLanguage=German

to

VoiceLanguage=English
SubtitleLanguage=English

I have downloaded speech_english.pak (699mb) 
and puted it in \data\ Change in ini file:
text:English
audio:English
and in mountlist.
But it doesnt work. There are no speech at all.
Do you have any ideas why? Maybe version 667 will work?

its works

FIRST STEP:
put this file English.pak to  \\Gothic III\\Data

SECOND STEP: change the file \\My Documents\\gothic3\\UserOptions.ini, change

VoiceLanguage=German
SubtitleLanguage=German

to

VoiceLanguage=English
SubtitleLanguage=English

THIRD STEP: 
change the file \Gothic III\Ini\mounlist.ini change 

Data/Speech_German=Data/Speech_German
;Data/Speech_French=Data/Speech_French
;Data/Speech_English=Data/Speech_English

TO

;Data/Speech_German=Data/Speech_German
;Data/Speech_French=Data/Speech_French
Data/Speech_English=Data/Speech_English

 see the difference ;

THATS ALL
